text: Hualɨ 41.53-54 HJL 7.11 hulihuli vivi navɨdaci hualɨ human limu fɨhala human limu ahica cɨjɨŋ umi. Uci ci lɨci cɨhu Josepɨ agaŋ humɨgaŋ ibɨlibɨliŋ hekɨlɨ iahaiaha hɨnidaci hualɨ human limu fɨhala human limu ahica cɨjɨŋ ubali agasaŋ abami agaŋ heŋ ala hɨdɨlɨ maha iahami. Humɨgaŋ ibɨlibɨliŋ hekɨlɨ agaŋ fɨli tɨbɨ mu hɨvɨ mu hɨvɨ iahami. Iahɨci ala Isipɨ fɨli tɨbɨ heŋ sɨmɨŋ hanɨbuŋ hɨnimi.
